code: import{get,post}from"./base";export var fetchTemplatesData=function fetchTemplatesData(data){return get("/app/templatesGet",data);};export var fetchTemplateFormData=function fetchTemplateFormData(data){return get("/app/documentGet",data);};export var pdfDownLoad=function pdfDownLoad(data){return get("/app/pdfDownload",data);};export var getDocumentList=function getDocumentList(data){return post("/app/documentListByOrder",data);};export var getDraft=function getDraft(data){return get("/app/documentFormDraft",data);};export var saveDraft=function saveDraft(data){return post("/app/SaveDocumentInfo?isGeneratePdf=false&fileExtension=.eform2",data);};export var getNoConformityList=function getNoConformityList(data){return get("/app/CheckListNonConformity",data);};export var getHistoryList=function getHistoryList(data){return get("/app/CheckListNonConformityHistory",data);};export var closeNonConfirmityItems=function closeNonConfirmityItems(data){return post("/app/CloseNonConfirmityItems",data);};
